Apos.​Input.​InputHelper
public static
Apos.​Input.​InputHelper

Unorganized helper functions for Apos.Input.  Also holds some important variables for this library to work correctly.

Public Variables
Game
public static Game Game { get; set }

Pass your game class here.

IsActive
public static bool IsActive { get }

Checks if the game is active. Usually this is when the game window has focus.

Window
public static GameWindow Window { get }

The game window.

WindowWidth
public static int WindowWidth { get }

The game window's width.

WindowHeight
public static int WindowHeight { get }

The game window's height.

OldMouse
public static MouseState OldMouse { get }

The mouse's previous state.

NewMouse
public static MouseState NewMouse { get }

The mouse's current state.

OldKeyboard
public static KeyboardState OldKeyboard { get }

The keyboard's previous state.

NewKeyboard
public static KeyboardState NewKeyboard { get }

The keyboard's current state.

OldGamePad
public static GamePadState[] OldGamePad { get }

An array with all gamepads' previous states.

NewGamePad
public static GamePadState[] NewGamePad { get }

An array with all gamepads' current states.

GamePadCapabilities
public static GamePadCapabilities[] GamePadCapabilities { get }

An array with all gamepads' info.

NewTouchCollection
public static TouchCollection NewTouchCollection { get }

A touch collection that holds the previous and current touch locations.

TouchPanelCapabilities
public static TouchPanelCapabilities TouchPanelCapabilities { get }

Gives info about a touch panel.

TextEvents
public static List<TextInputEventArgs> TextEvents { get }

Useful for handling text inputs from any keyboard layouts. This is useful when coding textboxes.

Public Functions
UpdateSetup
public static void UpdateSetup()

Call this at the beginning of your update loop.

Update
public static void Update()

Call this at the end of your update loop.

Private Functions
setup
private static void setup()

This is called automatically on the first update setup call.

processTextInput
private static void processTextInput(
object sender,
TextInputEventArgs e
)

This function receives TextInput events from the game window.

Parameters
sender
object

This gets ignored.

e
TextInputEventArgs

Contains a character and a key.

Private Variables
_initiated
private static bool _initiated

Whether setup has been called or not.

The mouse's previous state.

private static MouseState _newMouse

The mouse's current state.

The keyboard's previous state.

private static KeyboardState _newKeyboard

The keyboard's current state.

An array with all gamepads' previous states.

private static GamePadState[] _newGamepad

An array with all gamepads' current states.

private static GamePadCapabilities[] _gamePadCapabilities

An array with all gamepads' info.

private static TouchCollection _newTouchCollection

A touch collection that holds the previous and current touch locations.

private static TouchPanelCapabilities _touchPanelCapabilities

Gives info about a touch panel.

_textEvents
private static List<TextInputEventArgs> _textEvents

Useful for handling text inputs from any keyboard layouts. This is useful when coding textboxes.
